title: Edit Git Configuration File
description: Git is a popular version control system that allows developers to track changes in their codebase. Git configuration file is a file that contains settings that affect the behavior of Git. In this challenge, you will learn how to edit the Git configuration file using the Git text editor.

meta.description: Learn how to edit the Git configuration file and customize the behavior of Git for your development projects.
